title: Electrical Work

faqs.a: Yes, all our electricians are fully licensed and certified by the Nepal Electricity Authority (NEA).
Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency electrical services for urgent repairs and safety issues.

faqs.q: What types of electrical work do you do?
faqs.a: We handle residential and commercial electrical work including repairs, installations, maintenance, and safety inspections.
Yes, all our electrical work comes with a comprehensive warranty for your peace of mind.
